export var jobResource="http://localhost:8082/api/v1/jobs";// const jobResource = `http://localhost:9000/jobs`;
import axios from"axios";export var getAllJobs=function getAllJobs(reqParams,cb){return axios("".concat(jobResource,"?").concat(reqParams)).then(function(res){var result=res.data;cb(result);});};export var saveJob=function saveJob(jobId,cb){return axios.post("".concat(jobResource,"/").concat(jobId,"/save"),{jobId:jobId}).then(function(res){return cb(res.data.id);});};export var removeJob=function removeJob(saveJobId){return axios.delete("".concat(jobResource,"/saved/").concat(saveJobId));};export var getAllSavedJobs=function getAllSavedJobs(cb){return axios("".concat(jobResource,"/saved")).then(function(res){var savedJobsId=res.map(function(item){return item.id;});cb(savedJobsId);});};
